#include<iostream>
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;
long long dpfib[1000001];
int main()
{
	int i;
	dpfib[1]=0;
	dpfib[2]=1;
	for(i=3;i<=1000000;i++)
	{
		dpfib[i]=(dpfib[i-1]%M+dpfib[i-2]%M)%M;
	}
	long long t,a,b,r,ans;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>a>>b>>r;
		if(r==1)
		ans=a;
		else if(r==2)
		ans=b;
		else
		{
			ans=((dpfib[r]%M*b)%M+(dpfib[r-1]%M*a)%M)%M;
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
